meanings.definition: A person or thing that sends something.
meanings.sent1: The senders of the package were very efficient in their work.
meanings.sent2: The senders of the email included all the necessary information.
meanings.sent3: The senders of the invitations made sure to address them to the correct recipients.
meanings.sent4: The senders of the radio signals were located in a remote area.
meanings.sent5: The senders of the gift wrapped it beautifully before sending it.

meanings.definition: The person who sends a message or letter.
meanings.sent1: The sender of the text was excited to receive a reply.
meanings.sent2: The sender of the letter used a stamp to mail it.
meanings.sent3: The sender of the email accidentally attached the wrong file.
meanings.sent4: The sender of the package carefully sealed it before sending it off.
meanings.sent5: The sender of the parcel wrote a heartfelt note inside.

meanings.definition: The source or originator of something.
meanings.sent1: The sender of the rumor remained anonymous.
meanings.sent2: The sender of the virus disguised their identity well.
meanings.sent3: The sender of the idea sparked a lively discussion.
meanings.sent4: The sender of the donation preferred to remain humble.
meanings.sent5: The sender of the inspiration remained a mystery to many.
